page.title: 09Village Fairs
page.content: {Hutton Buscel}Fair is held each year In the morning residents take their entries for judging.The Boys Brigade Band led all those in the Fancy Dress and Decorated Bicycle down the village to the Old Schoolyard, where the entertainers,craft demonstrators and refresments were waiting. The Fair ends with the Squire Osbaldeston Wager when two teams of villagers pass a ball from one to another covering a mile. {Wykeham,Ruston & N.Moor}fair follows a a similar pattern to that held in Hutton Buscel.It is held in Wykeham each August. There are classes for produce,floral art.home economics, handicrafts and childrens'class. A trophy is presented to the winner of each class.The afternoon is taken up with competitions,exhibitions,sports for the children nd finally tea forall
